TopicTitle: How many module manager patches does ksp load for you?

Articles.Content:
I'm just curious to see if my 1257 patches is a regular amount.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T03:22:39Z" title="04/01/2015 03:22  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by peachoftree**

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95398-How-many-modulemanager-patches-does-your-install-have](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95398-How-many-modulemanager-patches-does-your-install-have)
I recently did a 80+ mod install on Linux that had ~4000 patches. I decided that was crazy person behavior and toned it down a little.
...6357 at last start up, and I'm not sure all of them loaded...
wow. I'm genuinely surprised to find myself on the low side

> 
> wow. I'm genuinely surprised to find myself on the low side

No, your about average for a windows install. I got up to just over 4000 in windows a few versions ago. I switched to Linux to get over 6000.
I'll have to check the load screen again, but it's somewhere around 3500.

<moderation>Moved to General Add-on Affairs, where add-ons like Module Manager are discussed</moderation>

I'll have to update my modded install. Recently, that's a 0 for me, though it's typically been around 700.
Last time I checked, I averaged around the ~1400 mark.
I'm at about 8400.
Somewhere around 4k . I do my own MM cfg that modify other MM cfg by modders, which means a lot of patch and repatch.
On Linux I've got about 11000 patches. I should cut down on that...
13474 thus far and counting.
7275 here

> 
> I'm at about 8400.

Are we competing for something here or what ... because you win ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) ?

> 
> Are we competing for something here or what ... because you win ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) ?

No he didn't, at least two people that posted have more.

> 
> No he didn't, at least two people that posted have more.

Good god. It had 3GB of mods before I started cutting down, and it only applied 3k patches.
Any PART[\*] patch applies (number of parts) patches. That's what shoots up the count.

I currently have 12,510 patches. Some are from the mods I have, but I've spent wayyy to much time editing things to my liking. I can almost guarantee that that number will increase at some point today.

**Edit:** Ok, now I'm at 14,024... I told you, lmao

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-05T02:26:32Z" title="04/05/2015 02:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 5, 2015</time> by FiiZzioN**
1700 for me. I'm as surprised as you are by these results, OP.
I just hit 12814
Don't wanna be a necroposter, I just realllly wanna share that I have 13649 patches sorry I just needed to say.

> 
> 
> On 4/1/2015 at 5:20 AM, peachoftree said:
> 
> 
> I'm just curious to see if my 1257 patches is a regular amount.
> 

yeah I have quite a bit of mods and I'm around 2000\2500
Currently... 19,998 patches.
